data.title: Performance enhancement of perovskite solar cells with Mg-doped TiO2 compact film as the hole-blocking layer
data.meta_description: In this letter, we report perovskite solar cells with thin dense Mg-doped TiO2 as hole-blocking layers (HBLs), which outperform cells using TiO2 HBLs in several
